title: Flower Fables, Part 7 of 7
description:
Tonight, Elizabeth continues reading "Fable 8: Ripple, the Water-Spirit" and finishes with "Fable 9: Fairy Song" from Flower Fables, by Louisa May Alcott, originally published in 1854.
